short_summary: repair of a wharf and infrastructure restoration
full_summary:
### Wharf Repairs – Carmanville, NL

**Notice Reference:** PW-23-01021673
**Amendment Number:** 1
** Solicitation Number:** 30003701

**Procurement Details:**

* **Publication Date:** January 17, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** February 1, 2023, at 13:00:00
* **Amendment Date:** January 18, 2023

**Contracting Entity:**
             
Fisheries and Oceans Canada  
200 Kent St, Station 13E228  
Ottawa, Ontario K1A 0E6, Canada

**Procurement Category and Method:**

* **Procurement Category:** Construction Services
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive Bidding - Open Invitation

**Trade Agreements:**

This contracting opportunity is open to bidders with the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

**Notice Details:**

The scope of work for this project includes the repair of an existing wharf in Carmanville, Newfoundland and Labrador. The proposed work involves the demolition and removal of an approximately 6.1m long by 9.1m wide section of creosote timber cribwork, along with the associated components. Reinstatement of new timber cribwork, including reinforced concrete deck, and all associated components is also included in the scope.

**Requirements and Deadline:**

The proposed work must be completed by April 30, 2023. Bidders must submit a request for qualification to be considered for this contract.

**Attachments:**

The tender package can be accessed on the Canada Buys website. The request for qualification document is attached in both English and French.

**Contact Information:**

For any inquiries or requests, please contact Kimberly Martin at [DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca](mailto:DFOtenders-soumissionsMPO@dfo-mpo.gc.ca) or phone 506-429-2397.
